author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Republic Services Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.98‍​
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Republic Services Inc:
* REPUBLIC SERVICES, INC. REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR RESULTS; COMPANY PROVIDES 2018 FULL-YEAR GUIDANCE
* Q4 ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS $0.61 PER SHARE​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.98‍​ * ‍ QTRLY REVENUES $2,560 MILLION VERSUS. $2,379.1 MILLION * ‍EXPECTS ADJUSTED FREE CASH FLOW TO BE $1,090 MILLION TO $1,115 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 18 PERCENT OVER PRIOR YEAR​
* ‍EXPECTS ADJUSTED DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE TO BE IN RANGE OF $3.05 TO $3.10 FOR FY
* ‍EXPECTS AN INCREASE IN REVENUE OF 4.0 TO 4.5 PERCENT FOR FY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
